reviewtext: Works great. Actually improved SNR(signal noise ratio). To check your signal turn on tv and cable box then turn off cable box only and press OK/Select button or menu button (depends on cable box) on remote.Look at the inband status SNR and the OOB (out of band) status SNR and AGC (auto gain control)it will tell you your signal strength good,fair,poor,or invalid so your can troubleshoot your connections."
